Lovely dining experience in the Eixample.  How could those deep fried artichokes be so light?  The scampi risotto so flavorful?  The stuffed chicken was right on Christmas point with a beautiful prune, apple, raisin compote.  And lavender ice cream for dessert was a wonderful final note.  Staff recommended wine paired perfectly and was perfectly poured throughout our two hour lunch.  How much fun to watch the kitchen staff prepare the dishes!  Every staff member was so gracious and always smiling - really looked like they were enjoying their opportunity to host diners.  This restaurant sets an incredibly high bar.  Looking forward to our next visit.
